subtitle: This tasty dish is really quick and easy to make. Use any seasonal vegetables like cauliflower, carrots or even a medley of prepared frozen vegetables.

method.text: Saute the broccoli florets in the butter or margarine for about 5 min or until just tender.
Remove from the pan with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Cook the pasta in a pan of fast boiling salted water for 2-4 min or until tender to the bite.

Stir the flour into the remaining butter in the pan and cook for 1 min. Gradually add the milk, stirring continuously until thickened. Stir the cheese into the white sauce and heat gently until melted. Stir in the broccoli and walnuts.
Drain the pasta thoroughly. Toss in the sauce. Serve garnished with a grinding of black pepper.

title: Cheese with broccoli and walnut bake
